price: To su Allahovi ajeti koje tebi istinito kazujemo. A Allah ne želi da bilo kome nepravdu učini.
arabic: تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱللَّهِ نَتۡلُوهَا عَلَيۡكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَمَا ٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ ظُلۡمٗا لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: til'ka āyātu al-lahi natlūhā ʿalayka bil-ḥaqi wamā al-lahu yurīdu ẓul'man lil'ʿālamīna
